title: MAG 065 - Binary Transcript
text:
this place. 
TIM 
I don’t understand. 
ARCHIVIST 
Neither do I. I’m trying to figure it out. I, I’ve got the shape of it, but... I’m 
sorry, Tim. Truly I am. But I cannot and will not trust you. This place isn’t right. 
You see that now. I don’t know how or why, but there is something very wrong 
with the Archives. And I don’t know who here is a victim of it and who is an 
agent. 

The Magnus Archives – Episode 065 – Binary 
20 
 
(Pause) 
TIM 
So... what do we do? 
ARCHIVIST 
For now, I suppose we just... do our jobs. 
TIM 
I don’t want to. 
ARCHIVIST 
No, no. 
TIM 
I, uh, suppose I’ll see you later. 
ARCHIVIST 
I suppose so. 
[Door closes] 
ARCHIVIST 
End supplemental. 
[Tape clicks off.] 

The Magnus Archives – Episode 065 – Binary 
21

Today’s episode was written by Jonathan Sims and directed by Alexander J 
Newall. 
It featured: Jonathan Sims as The Archivist, Fran Bushe as Tessa Winters and 
Mike LeBeau as Tim Stoker.
